Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 58th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1983...
Injured on 5/23/1985 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/1987 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 8 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/23/1990...
Traded from Cincinnati to San Francisco on 6/16/1990 (Going to SF: P J. Habyan. Going to CIN: 1B P. Sorrento)...
Injured on 6/20/1991 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/28/1992 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1992, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1993, going 6-0, 1.62...
Injured on 8/25/1993 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1994, winning 2 games with a 1.53 ERA...
